name: Troy
description: print("a spidery looking man with delicate hands.\n*")

52:
print(""I make @clocks. The movements of the various
parts are very
complex and interconnected."
")
print("\n\"Like the @moons and stars, or the pieces on a @chess board.\"")
print("\"The @ticking of clocks is the pulse of @civilization.\"")
print("\"Without clocks, people would just sit around uselessly, with no idea what to do next!\"")
print("\"Of course, the ticks would be useless without the @tocks.\"")
print("\"They're much deeper sounding and more satisfying than ticks.\"")
print("\"@Ephemerides is going to build a model of the whole system.\"\n*\n\"I helped him design the @gearwork that makes it go.\"")
print("\"If you didn't run around asking foolish questions all the time, you might learn something yourself!\"")
print("\"I like to play chess. Keeps ones @mind fit.\"")
print("\"Some people don't use theirs - but I do.\"")
print("\"Until we come into conjunction again.\"\n")
print("\"The sound of the clocks is so soothing... Excuse me, did you say something?\"")
